#Synopsis.text:
Meme Oshino decides to take drastic measures, so he puts the origami which represents the Oddity and throws it to the ground violently. There, he considers taking care of the crab in a more violent manner, but Hitagi Senjougahara, struggling to stand up after the close encounter with the heavy stone crab, pleads to Meme to give her another chance. 
As Meme holds on to the crab, Hitagi prepares herself as she bows low at the god who took her weight and her memories.
